name: with-csv
description: A CSV file manipulation library with a fluent API Ã  la Lodash

scripts.fixtures:generate: echo 'Generating Fixtures'; ts-node tests/generate.ts; echo 'Compressing Fixtures'; for i in small medium large; do tar -czvf tests/fixtures/$i.tar.gz tests/fixtures/$i.csv; done
scripts.fixtures:unpack: echo 'Unpacking Fixtures'; for i in small medium large; do tar -xzvf tests/fixtures/$i.tar.gz; done
scripts.posttest: for i in tests/fixtures/*.result.csv; do rm -f $i; done
scripts.test: echo 'Test suite'; for i in tests/**/*.test.ts; do ts-node $i; done; echo 'Benchmark suite'; for i in tests/**/*.benchmark.ts; do ts-node $i;done
